1.0.name: wordpress/wp-links-shortcode
1.0.description:
This plugin makes it easy to output a list of Links on any WordPress Post, Page, or other Custom Post Type. The shortcode uses the WordPress native wp_list_bookmarks function call to output the list. All native function arguments are available to the shortcode.

For more information on this plugin and support for this plugin, visit WP Links Shortcode on O3.
